title: telisi teliya
sahitya:
telisi teliya nI vAralakE gati telupavE shrI krSNa ilalO


anupallavi

  vilasitamuga sadgati nirgatiyani vicada pariciti vintEgAni


caraNam 1    satkrtyamu jEyu bhakta varulaku sAlOkya mosakitivi krSNa 
duSkrtyulaku ghOra narakAdi dukkhamu kalga jEsitivEgAni
    caraNam 2    satatamu ninu golicina vAriki sAmIpya mosakitivi krSNa
patitulaina bhuvi janulaku kAlabAdha kalga jEsitivEgAni
    caraNam 3    saguNa dhyAna varANyulaku nI sArUpya mosakitivi krSNa
agaNita pApulanu yamunihimsalanu bhavimpa jEsitivEgAni
    caraNam 4    sajjananuta gOpAla dAsulaku sAyujya mosakitivi krSNa 
durjanulanu vaivasvata lOkamu dOva pAlu jEsitivEgAni
